headline: Palo Alto Networks (PANW) to Acquire CyberArk in $25 Billion AI Security Deal
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On July 30, Reuters reported that Palo Alto Networks has agreed to buy Israeli peer CyberArk Software for an estimated $25 billion, its biggest deal yet. CEO Nikesh Arora strives to develop a comprehensive cyber security provider to capitalize on AI-driven demand. […]

headline: SentinelOne (S) Gains High-Level CCN Certification Enhancing Government Security Reach
summary: SentinelOne (S) recently achieved high-level certifications from the Spanish National Cryptologic Center, enhancing its capabilities in protecting sensitive government assets. Additionally, reports of potential acquisition talks with Palo Alto Networks pushed the company's stock price significantly during the month. Despite this, SentinelOne's on-market performance remained largely flat over the past month, aligning with broader market trends. The company's significant product certifications...
